attributes.action: Make Brexit happen as per the people's vote or we will never vote again.
attributes.additional_details: It was our vote, so honor it.
attributes.background: People spoke with their vote on Thursday 23 June, 2016, and the majority win was to Leave the EU-this is what should happen.  It seems certain government individuals are doing whatever they can to make it not happen.  There is no point of having the power to vote if the wish of the people is ignored
